about: Vinson Jewelry is a unique project that required a custom-built website to meet their specific needs. The website was developed with a focus on showcasing their wide range of high-quality imitation jewelry, which they export to the USA and Canada. The site features a clean and modern design that highlights the beauty of their products and provides an enjoyable user experience. With its robust and intuitive back-end, Vinson Jewelry is well-equipped to manage their online presence and meet the needs of their growing business.

Ms Lingies is a startup that was in need of a custom-built website to establish their brand presence online. The website was developed with the aim of providing a seamless online shopping experience for customers, inspired by the functionality of multi-billion dollar sites like Amazon, Flipkart, and Zivame. The website was custom-built to meet the unique needs of Ms Lingies and provides an attractive and user-friendly interface for browsing and purchasing their products on platforms like Myntra and Ajio. The end result is a website that effectively represents the brand and helps drive sales.

JFD Foods LLP is an authentic Indian masala exporting company that required a custom-built website to showcase their wide range of products. The website was developed with the aim of providing an easy-to-use platform for customers to browse and learn about JFD Foods' products. The site features a clean and intuitive design, with clear product categorization and detailed information about each item. With its user-friendly interface and comprehensive product catalog, JFD Foods' website effectively represents their brand and helps drive sales.
tech: Dynamic Recipe Upload on Each Product
